name: Inspectlet Websites HeadMap
author: David Garcia

sections.description:
Allows to insert the script code (www.inspectlet.com – Free Plan) inside the section to start recording our visitors activity inside our website.

Visit the Seocom website for more information about SEO or WPO optimization
sections.installation:
1. Install Inspectlet Websites HeadMap either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server inside the wp-content/plugins folder of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate Inspectlet Websites HeadMap plugin via WordPress Settings.
  3. It’s done. Easy, isn’t it?
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Added direct link to plugin settings page from plugins page.

1.0.2

  • BugFix. Removed javascript error. Plugin is fully functional again.

1.0.1

  • Modifications to the plugin description.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
